TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Abnormal cells are found in the innermost lining of the anus. These abnormal cells may become cancer and spread into nearby normal tissue.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage 0 anal carcinoma in situ"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "carcinoma del ano in situ, estadio 0"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: carcinoma del ano in situ, estadio 0

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Se encuentran células anormales en el revestimiento más interno del ano. Estas células anormales pueden volverse cancerosas y diseminarse hasta el tejido normal cercano.
